p: St. Louis Circuit Court Case Files- Civil December Term 1866, No. 3965

Release of Missouri Bird, 10 years old, colored; "restrained of liberty" by Mrs. Pattmore, resided at 11th Street between Cass & O'Fallon Streets; child kept "as servant without compensation"; counterclaim of abuse & neglect by "Lizzie" Bird
Plaintiff attorney: Clarke, Enos; Coonley, John J.
